name: Curse of Huh
description:
The Curse of Huh

‘Rock Froze’ Dai David Davies entered the tomb of the ancient Eyptian Gods to steal their treasure, only to have the ancient god of time, Huh, place a curse on him! Stuck in a time loop, will he escape the angry Huh’s wrath with the aid of…himself?

Authors

Sam Pring (JagsyFox)

Anthony Warren-Baker (NinoWolfie)

James Simons

Josh Morris
